docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, July 31.--The Anglo-South American Bank announced today the closing of its branch and two agencies in Montevideo effective Aug. 31, its interests in Uruguay thereafter to be handled by the London and South American Bank.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, July 31.--The Anglo-South American Bank announced today the closing of its branch and two agencies in Montevideo effective Aug. 31, its interests in Uruguay thereafter to be handled by the London and South American Bank.
docs.abstract: To close branches at Santiago and Antofagasta, Chile; to handle business of Anglo-South Amer Bank in Montevideo, Uruguay

headline.main: BRITISH CUT BANKS IN SOUTH AMERICA; Anglo and London Firms Split Territory in Uruguayan and Chilean Fields. SMALL PROFITS FORCE STEP Bankers Feel Southern Republics Have Too Many Foreign Financial Institutions in Competition.

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: THE resignation of President Ibanez of Chile after a long and determined struggle on his  part to keep himself in power and his country from bankruptcy has again directed attention to the troubled affairs of South America.
docs.lead_paragraph: THE resignation of President Ibanez of Chile after a long and determined struggle on his part to keep himself in power and his country from bankruptcy has again directed attention to the troubled affairs of South America.
docs.abstract: Feature article on relation of revolt to troubles of Latin Amer

headline.main: CHILE'S REVOLUTION BOUND UP WITH TROUBLES OF CONTINENT; SOUTH AMERICAN REVOLUTIONISTS ON THE MARCH

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Aug. 1 (AP).--Uruguay's determination to pay her interest and sinking fund obligations "at whatever sacrifice" was declared today through the Washington Legation.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Aug. 1 (AP).--Uruguay's determination to pay her interest and sinking fund obligations "at whatever sacrifice" was declared today through the Washington Legation.

headline.main: URUGUAY WILL PAY DEBTS AT ANY COST; Washington Legation Announces Determination--StateSalaries to Be Slashed.TARIFF RISES ARE PLANNED Country Hopes to Ban Non-Essential or Competitive Goods--Dutiesin Argentina to Go Up.
Letters to the Editor; PAN AMERICA SPEAKS. Our Neighbors to the South on Rela tions With the United States.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Aug. 2.--Two police officers, a patrolman and a Communist were killed and three patrolmen wounded in a battle last night between the police and Communists in Rocha, Uruguay, and Montevideo passed through a night of extreme nervousness as...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Aug. 2.--Two police officers, a patrolman and a Communist were killed and three patrolmen wounded in a battle last night between the police and Communists in Rocha, Uruguay, and Montevideo passed through a night of extreme nervousness as a result of wild rumors of a Communist outbreak.
docs.abstract: Deaths resulting from outbreaks in many countries

headline.main: 8 DIE IN RED RIOTS IN MANY COUNTRIES; Four Slain at Rocha, Uruguay and Three in Poland--Mexican Is Fatally Wounded.BARCELONA SEES BATTLE Rumania, Bulgaria, Austria, Czechoslovakia and Hungary CheckAnti-War Parades.

headline.main: ARGENTINA OPENS SAFE OF SOVIET'S BUREAU; Raids on Communists Are Ordered in Uruguay to GetFurther Evidence.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Aug. 5.--Argentina is planning to pay in gold the $50,000,000 borrowed in New York  last September by the Irigoyen Government but the approach of the maturity date is causing serious concern ...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Aug. 5.--Argentina is planning to pay in gold the $50,000,000 borrowed in New York last September by the Irigoyen Government but the approach of the maturity date is causing serious concern ...
docs.abstract: Govt plans to pay in gold $50,000,000 borrowed in N Y last Sept by Irigoyen Govt; approach of maturity date causes concern

headline.main: URIBURU MAY SHIP $50,000,000 HERE; Argentine President Likely to Deplete Gold Reserve Rather Than Pay High for Loan. BLOW TO BUSINESS SEEN Bankers Here Assert No Overtures Have Been Made by Buenos Aires for Renewal.
